text: Woopra (http://www.woopra.com/) - San Francisco, CA Leading customer analytics company. We just moved to a new bigger space in the heart of SoMa SF (1 block away from the caltrain station). We're looking to fill 2 positions: * Frontend Engineer * Sysop Engineer To apply, visit http://www.woopra.com/careers/ or email us at careers@woopra.com.
